name: Purchase Transaction Missing Security Code
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST - https://fargate.test.payall.com/v1/acquiring/process

raw 
  {
    "program_id": "1b1476f8-3b30-4e94-8b8b-e7b312e6d5c8",
    "merchant_id": "016fd8c3-f677-a782-122d-2b55e30c93ce",
    "type": "PURCHASE",
    "amount": 12.5,
    "currency_code": "USD",
    "reference": "da040abf-314c-41fd-b556-2b1b8a5c9266TEST",
    "stored_payment_instrument": {
        "id": "0178354e-d0de-ac1a-98bb-5ed2130cb03d"
    },
    "payment_instrument": null
}

Response:

400 - Bad Request 

  {"error":{"code":"BAD_REQUEST","message":"Missing parameter in your request, check request body. Detail : missing stored_payment_instrument field","errors":null}}
